body_html:
We're sure to do this eventually, although it's not on the immediate roadmap. As andrew said, we are currently working on a plugin system for TensorBoard.

If any other contributors are interested in working on this, we could get this launched a lot sooner with some help. I'm marking it contributions welcome.

body:
We're sure to do this eventually, although it's not on the immediate roadmap. As andrew said, we are currently working on a plugin system for TensorBoard.

If any other contributors are interested in working on this, we could get this launched a lot sooner with some help. I'm marking it contributions welcome.
